description: This file is an HTML source that implements a web-based database viewer interface, including styling, structure, and embedded JavaScript for dynamic data loading and user interactions.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the server and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list in the sidebar, resetting current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data from a selected table, supporting limit parameter.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs and injects an HTML table from data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling objects, long strings, and nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content to show full data or truncated view.
